title: Self-Directed Development of Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) Skills in Home-Based Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and academic goal-setting experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning SRL (Self-Regulated Learning) interventions linking home and campus environments for adult learners

learning_goals: Learners can set specific academic goals and develop action plans within three weeks.
Learners can monitor weekly learning progress and document feedback records.
Learners can revise and improve learning strategies through self-assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
